sentences: Su tara ei ole pahane, aga see võib olla valvav.
Mina saan sinna minna, aga tara on see, et mul peab olema aega.
Ta tõusis koju, kuid tema tara oli napp.
context: 'Tara' is primarily used to mean 'welcome' in Estonian. It can also refer to someone's physical or emotional condition, a fact, or a state of something depending on the context.
